relation: CHapter 1 questions? i've been having trouble with my summer assignment questions and i cant understand to answer them. 1. explain why the author and colleagues chose to focus on 375 million year old rocks in their search for fossils. must appreciated

textAfterTable: Zuly Official Newbie! Joined: Oct 2010 Posts: 4 Thanks: 0 Thanked: 1 time in 1 post Gender:  Re: CHapter 1 questions? Fossils had been found on rocks from 365 million years ago of Reptiles and Amphibians. Older rocks, 385 mya, show fossils of fish, no neck, with a conical head, etc. The researchers hypothesized that a transitional form would probably be found roughly in between those time periods.
